{"id":1218759011,"question_id":3374,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1711853356,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1218759011/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Alternating Subarrays","memory":"56.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countAlternatingSubarrays(int[] nums) {\n        long res = 0;\n        \n        int i=0, j=0;\n        \n        while(i<nums.length && j<nums.length){\n            if(j<nums.length-1 && nums[j+1]!=nums[j]){\n                j++;\n            }else{\n                res += (((long)(j-i+2)*(j-i+1))/2);\n                i=j+1;\n                j=i;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-alternating-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
